Test Steps: Leave username and password fields blank, Click 'Sign up'
Expected Result: Error message 'Please fill out Username and Password' appears.

Test Steps: Click 'Add to cart' on 'Samsung galaxy s6', Click 'Cart' in Navbar
Expected Result: 'Product added' message appears; cart shows product and total.

Description: System accepts invalid payment details (e.g., numbers in name, letters in card number, invalid date) without error
Test Steps: Add product to cart, Click 'Cart' > 'Place Order', Enter Name: 123, Card: abc, Date: 1/6/2025, Click 'Purchase'
Expected Result: Order confirmation with order ID appears without validation errors.

Description: Acceptance criteria refers to a 'cart icon' that does not exist; 'Cart' link in Navbar used instead
Test Steps: Review User Story 2 documentation, Observe Navbar for 'Cart' link
Expected Result: No cart icon found; 'Cart' link present.

Description: Deleting a product from cart occurs without confirmation, risking unintended removal
Test Steps: Add 'Nexus 6' to cart, Click 'Cart' in Navbar, Click 'Delete' next to 'Nexus 6'
Expected Result: 'Nexus 6' removed without confirmation; total amount (e.g., 2110 - 650) updates to 1460.

Description: Verify filtering products by category works
Test Steps: Select 'Phones' category filter, Verify only phones are displayed

Description: Verify adding a filtered product to cart
Test Steps: Click 'Add to cart' on a filtered product, Click 'Cart' in Navbar
Expected Result: Product added; cart shows product and total.

Description: Verify removing a filtered product from cart
Test Steps: Add a filtered product (e.g., Samsung galaxy s6), Click 'Delete' next to the product, Verify cart update
Expected Result: Product removed without confirmation; total amount updates correctly.

Test Steps: Click 'Cart' > 'Place Order', Enter any details, Click 'Purchase'
Expected Result: Order confirmation with order ID appears.

Description: Verify filters work across multiple categories
Test Steps: Apply 'Laptops' filter, then 'Phones' filter, Verify display
Expected Result: Only relevant products from each filter shown.
